title: Not So Realized Holiday Skins
body:
My ideas are simply comic guided skins to display some holidays or celebrations not necessarily needed but would be quite funny based on the characters they come from.

*Number 1 Dad Draven:* For the upcoming Fathers Day, Draven could be seen running around the rift wearing a sporty Polo and Khakis  throwing what i feel large hammers. His Splash Art Could Be a mock up of Draven, Morgana (she is next), and Annie in the backyard of some house. Dragen could be flexing his muscles while with a hammer and nails in one hand while annie swings from a makeshift swing hanging off the bicep of his other arm.

*Number 1 Mom Morgana:* Coming from the last idea, this one is based more off of a Mothers Day Skin. Morgana could be seen sporting a old Nuclear Family Esque Red Polka Dottted Sun Dress while throwing what deems to be glasses of lemonade. In the Splash art, she could be coming out the house to lay glasses of lemonade out of the table for their backyard picnic antics they were preforming.

*Baby New Year Gnar:* We all know Gnar is that little fluff ball critter we all grew to love for his cuteness. What else would make him cuter then a skin that turns him into a baby with a sash and top hat which when he rages, turns into a big burly clock worker (since baby new year was centered around Father Time).

*FiddleStitiches:* Yes, Yes Fiddlesticks has a bountiful amount of skins but as ive seen Shen and Kennen both have Doctor skins so why not him aswell? This isnt holiday based but i was thinking of a Fiddlesticks dressed in full Doctor attire sporting the classical old doctor headgear and everything. He could possible throw a bonesaw, or scalpels, anything medical related. His splash art could be him in an operating room, stitching up Annie's torn up bear on an operating table. Annie is worried looking from the background teary eyed from a surgery examination window. you can even have an appearence of the other doctor skins roaming the halls outside the window aswell.

Though none being actual good ideas, i felt like showing them to the rest of the league community to atleast have a good laugh along with me to these though lame, equally awesome sounding ideas ^_^ Happy New Year to all, and may the Rift be ever in your favor.
